website_summaries.verdict: Choose this Garmin if you simply need a basic navigation system without a lot of fancy features. You'll also appreciate the price tag.
pros: One of the most affordable options by the brand, yet it still offers lifetime maps that drivers love
"Renewed" model is previously owned but tested by Amazon-qualified merchants
cons: Doesn't have a lot of the features of pricier options, like Bluetooth or smart functions

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Very nice GPS Navigator. When it came the Live Traffic function did not work apparently due to a faulty power cable that houses the antenna for the Live Traffic function. Contacted seller who immediately offered a free return lable or I could contact Garmin for in warrenty service. I contacted Garmin and they were super helpful and I had a new power cable and was up and running in less than a week. SUPER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Use WAZE.
customer_reviews.text: I hate that the display doesn’t show current time, ETA, and distance to destination simultaneously. Other units I have had all that plus progress along the route. It also doesn’t show if traffic information is being received. Do the engineers that green light these products even use them? The latest peeve is that I passed my displayed destination, yet the route keeps going in pink. That’s what my photo shows. It lags by about 1000 feet at other times. Now I know why it was "refurbished".
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this refurbished GPS and wouldn't have guessed that it wasn't new. This was such a great price and after taking a long trip we are very pleased that we purchased it. I read other reviews that you have to enter an address and can't search a city or state which aren't true. You just have to learn how to use it. Love how it tells you the delays and sometimes offers go-arounds for backups.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Unit Failure
customer_reviews.text: Not used frequently .Purchased for Travel Use.........Had for one year and 3 months Stored safely in package..... .Unit will no longer start or update.......The only time it shows any signs of live is when you try to update that Garmin Icon will appear but still this GPS is not recognized by computer to charge or update...........Using factory supplied auto and usb cables ....... the unit will not work......No longer responds to off on switch....Beware of "Refurbished" Classification
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get my money back out of memory cant even update the roads traffic updates don't work I travel for work and cant depend on this unit since it fails to update and using outdated maps
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Tovias

customer_reviews.title: very impressive GPS from GARMIN
customer_reviews.text: this GPS came wrapped as new with accessories. and it works great it tells about traffic ahead. it gives clear instructions. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished as good as new
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I had bought a new one originally but decided to try a refurbished one this time. Nice savings and just as good as the new one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: The feature I like best is it ask if you need a break ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it downloaded updated works very. The feature I like best is it ask if you need a break after about 200 miles and give suggestions of things up ahead
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great so far. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For this price, I have nothing to complaint since you have lifetime map and real time traffic report.
customer_reviews.author: KC209

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price. I don’t like the display, not enough info given on map page
customer_reviews.author: Richard Skrivanek

customer_reviews.title: A good GPS
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on my motorcycle although its not made for motorcycles and have never had a problem with it. I will buy again when I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Cosner

customer_reviews.title: It often gives wrong information even after updated the map ...
customer_reviews.text: It often gives wrong information even after updated the map. HD should be the way to go, plus I wish I can change the voice to a younger voice, lol
customer_reviews.author: LBY

product_meta.title: Garmin Drive 50 USA LMT GPS Navigator System with Lifetime Maps and Traffic, Driver Alerts, Direct Access, and Foursquare data (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Never have to worry about draining your smartphone's battery or going over on your cell data with the Certified Refurbished Garmin 50LMT Navigation System. With this unit, you won't be stuck without directions when you lose a cell signal in the middle of nowhere since a dedicated personal navigation system uses satellites instead of cell towers. Garmin packed this 5 inch GPS system full of goodies, including Garmin Real Directions so the voice helping you out sounds like a friend instead of a robot. Worry less about the fuzz with the built in speed limit indicator and know exactly which lane to be in with Junction View. You can even pair a BC30 wireless backup camera (sold separately) to give you eyes on the back of your head. No road trip is truly complete without the Certified Refurbished Garmin 50LMT Navigation System.
feature_bullets: Display size: 4.4 x 2.5 inches, 5 inches diagonal
Garmin Real Directions guides you like a copilot would with traffic lights and landmarks
Lane assist with junction view allows you to see the map and visual depiction of your exit at the same time
Preloaded street maps of the lower 49 United States and Canada so you don't have to download anything
Garmin Traffic gives you details about your trip or commute so you can avoid that nasty pileup or jammed up construction zone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
